title: Aurelion Sol ability text typo
body:
When you have a point in your e, you will gain a buff in your bar that states how much extra movement speed percentage you are getting. Even after the patch, it also states that you gain more Escape Velocity while at maximum percentage.

Escape Velocity was a mechanic used for his E before this current patch, so it does not exist anymore, and should be removed from this buff box.

replies.body: I know it's not a big thing but it's important to clean this kinda stuff up
